titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the bill (S. 990) to provide for an additional temporary extension of programs under the Small Business Act and the Small Business Investment Act of 1958, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the bill (S. 990) to provide for an additional temporary extension of programs under the Small Business Act and the Small Business Investment Act of 1958, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-92, by Mr. Dreier.
The resolution makes in order a motion offered by the chair of the Committee on the Judiciary that the House concur in the Senate amendment to the House amendment.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 41.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 281.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to the House amendment to the bill (S. 990) to provide for an additional temporary extension of programs under the Small Business Act and the Small Business Investment Act of 1958.
